metadata.dc:author: Carranza-Bencano, A
García-Renedo, R J
Pérez-Carro, L
Fernández-Torres, J J
Gómez-del Alamo, G
metadata.dc:description: The ankle soft tissue pathology represents a very painful disorder for patients who, often times, are not precisely diagnosed. Anterolateral ankle impingement is a condition that occurs in young people and athletes due to a plantar flexion-inversion mechanism. We report a case of anterolateral ankle impingement describing the arthroscopic technique and making the differential diagnosis considering other conditions.
metadata.dc:title: Dolor anterolateral de tobillo, diagnóstico diferencial y abordaje. Presentación de un caso.
[Anterolateral ankle pain: differential diagnosis and approach. A case report].
